backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a default-name UI change to App.tsx and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including App.tsx, animations, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH theme variables and dark mode overrides for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main interactive Valentine page with name input, Yes/No logic, moving No button, audio, confetti, and hearts animations.
frontend/src/components/Confetti.tsx: Generates 100 animated falling confetti pieces with randomized properties.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Continuously spawns floating heart icons that rise with randomized sizes and timing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors with reactive identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, login/logout logic, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder since no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with Valentine-themed OKLCH color variables, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, custom OKLCH-based color themes, extended fonts, shadows, and keyframes for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata and a feature request to revert the appâ€™s default displayed name to its previous value.
